
{{alias}}( fcn, duration[, ...args] )
    Invokes a function after a specified duration.

    Parameters
    ----------
    fcn: Function
        Function to invoke.

    duration: integer (optional)
        Duration (in milliseconds). May be specified as a duration string.

    args: ...(optional)
        Additional arguments to pass through to the delayed function.

    Returns
    -------
    out: Object
        Timer object.

    Examples
    --------
    > function beep() { console.log( 'beep' ); };
    > var t = {{alias}}( beep, 3000 )
    <Object>

    t.clear();
    > t.invoke()
    beep
    > t.duration
    3000

    See Also
    --------
